name: Healfy Chorers
description:
This is my first attempt at creating something on Unity. The brief was  to "create a small, single scene ‘diorama’ in Unity ... there should also be at least one interaction (and hopefully more) in your scene." My response was to create a wee game about stock hoarding during the Coronavirus  lockdown of 2020 and a couple of opportunists craving a bevy.  The link below contains all of my asset and script references.

https://vimeo.com/user62210830
